entry.title: The Sport Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 54.00

Description
If you know us, you know we can never create a bag that can only do one thing! This tote, backpack, yoga mat carrying, tennis racket fitting bag is absolutely no exception. Designed to be your go-to bag when your moving around, light trips to the gyms or a trip to your local yoga studio The Sport Tote will be your go to bag when you're on-the-move!

 
Specifications

Dims: 16"H x 12"W x 5.5"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
Simple - multi-wear and multi-use tote
2 ways to carry
As tote with webbing straps
As a backpack with adjustable backpack straps
Backpack straps when tightened also make a great place to thread a yoga mat, towel or jacket/extra layer
EXTERIOR
2 large side elasticized slip pockets
Drawstring & cord lock closure
INTERIOR
Large zip pocket
Key-leash to easily locate keys or clip to any pouch with a d-ring
2 slip pockets

How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate
Yoga, pilates, dance class

entry.title: The Puffer Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 78.00

Description
Gear up for the winter season with The Puffy Tote. This perfect sized edition to our tote collection comes with all the winter fun necessities, including a water resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear (or bathing suit if you’re not a snow bunny), a padded laptop sleeve and a hidden cell phone pocket - so documenting your adventures is never a task of hide & seek.

 
Shay's Inspo

“To me, this bag exemplifies the fabrication and highlights everything I love about this style. It’s perfectly shaped, sized and has features galore on the inside, too, to make it just as functional and is it fashionable.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
WATER RESISTANT BOTTOM COMPARTMENT
For your hat & gloves, shoes or bathing suit!
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry
HIDDEN EXTERNAL POCKET
Because: phone & keys.
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 15” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

entry.title: The Tote Insert
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 58.00

Description
While our original thoughts when designing this diaper bag insert were for Mums who want all the organization but to still keep their stylish bags - we realized while testing - just how amazing it is for everyone. Especially to keep that tote you're traveling with organized and in a pinch take out the insert and use the tote for shopping, a beach day, and an extra bag on-the-go! Designed to give you the absolute MOST organization, The Tote Insert, has an abundance of pockets, a padded laptop sleeve, our token key fob, a microsuede lined pocket for sunglasses, and a removable insulated bag for milk, snacks, your lunch, or a refreshing beverage.
Shay's Inspo

"I’ve really outdone myself with this one! Can I say that? Meet the Tote Insert. This is perfect for people who like to switch up their bags every now and again, but who don’t want to go through the rigmarole of taking everything out over and over. This bag ensures that all of your essentials are with you no matter what (BÉIS) bag you want to use."-Shay

Details


A POCKET FOR EVERYTHING

With this diaper bag organizer, there are endless ways to create the perfect way to organize all your baby's and your needs.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY

Regardless if you're going on a long trip or from the couch to the counter - this diaper bag insert makes the perfect companion to keep everything organized in your tote and everywhere in between!

ADAPTABLE

Make any tote bag a diaper bag for anyone who loves to have it all together. Padded Laptop Sleeve: 14.25" W x 9.25" H; Fits most 15" laptops

entry.title: The Messenger Tote in Tapestry
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 68.00

Description

A bag that goes both ways? How about SIX ways? A tote, a messenger, a 2-way backpack, a removable clutch - that can also be a sleek crossbody all in one super classic and sophisticated fabrication. We designed this bag to be as versatile as you but with a little wink to the tactility and electric fashions of past decades.
Shay's Inspo
“Okay, so I love this bag because you can wear it 100 different ways. Jut kidding. BUT, you can wear it a lot of different ways, the removable clutch makes this another bag that is perfect for going from day to night and the carry options makes it perfect for any mood or scenario. Overall she’s just your every day super fun, chic and functional bag. —Shay"
Details

REMOVABLE FLAP POUCH
Doubles as a clutch or crossbody
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE STRAP
Multiple ways to carry, 6 to be exact
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags

entry.title: The Mini Everyday Tote in Tapestry
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description

Multifunction in mini. Like it’s former, The Everyday Tote, this mini version was designed to tackle your everyday, travel and more. Packed with an enormous amount of function, including multiple ways to carry, a snap in pouch that turns into a crossbody and pockets upon pockets for organization. You asked for a version that was a little smaller and now here it is!
Shay's Inspo

"The secret is OUT: I LOVE THIS STYLE. Because I love it so much, I wanted to do the exact same shape that we’ve done and you’ve loved, but in my favorite new fabric. It’s like an oldie but good, but also a newie…what?" -Shay
Details

SO MANY STRAPS!
Multiple ways to carry
KEY FOB
Because: keys.
REMOVABLE POUCH
Converts into a shoulder bag!
EXTERNAL POCKET
Keep small items at-hand
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Airport security on-point.
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
ELASTIC WATER BOTTLE POCKET
Stay hydrated, with wine or water, no one is judging

entry.title: The Everyday Tote in Charcoal
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Multifunction at it's very best. Meticulously designed to tackle your everyday, travel, weekend getaways and more. This tote was packed with an enormous amount of function, including 3 different carrying straps and a snap-in pouch that can turn into a shoulder or cross-body bag in a pinch! Our signature padded laptop sleeve, key clip and trolley pass-through that doubles as a pocket, round out this masterpiece!
Shay's Inspo

"It’s true that I love all my babies equally, and this little number is no exception! This bag is almost like a medley of some of our existing hero products, and is so versatile I can’t stand it. Use it for travel, use it for work, use it for meetings but THEN, slip the chain through, pull out the organizational insert and you’ve got yourself a beautiful little purse for a quick exit. Everyday Tote - I love you everyday." -Shay
Details

SO MANY STRAPS!
Multiple ways to carry
REMOVABLE POUCH
Converts into a shoulder bag!
KEY FOB
Because: keys.
EXTERNAL POCKET
Keep small items at-hand
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Airport security on-point.
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
ELASTIC WATER BOTTLE POCKET
Stay hydrated, with wine or water, no one is judging
DIMENSIONS
17.5"W x 16"H x 6"L

entry.title: The Backpack Tote in Natural
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 78.00

Description

Similar to our best selling, The Convertible Backpack - updated with a summer bod! Still the most adorable and adaptable thing you've ever seen, with a summer-ready makeover. From back to tote or shoulder bag using an upgraded braided shoulder strap. Padded laptop sleeve, trolley sleeve - she will remain your best summer companion!
Shay's Inspo
“Backpacks are not USUALLY my go-to bags, but our new "Backpack Tote" that can be styled and worn three different ways may just make me a true believer. As much tote as backpack, I love the woven strap and versatility that this bag offers, and the fact that it is ready for WHATEVER you want to throw at it…day trip to the beach, carry-on, school supplies, staycation. I’m here for it all, with this bag. —Shay"
Details

CONVERTIBLE!
For a bag as versatile as you
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry
RFID-LINED FRONT EXTERIOR POCKET
Safety first.
EXTERNAL POCKETS
Organize ALL the things
KEY FOB
Never lose them again!
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 16" laptop 
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
